channel.title: How to add a [server] to the chatbox ingame [[474]]
channel.description: Like you know when you playing Allstarscape or something like that, you see a little [server] thing pop up, can i have a code for this? Also is it possible to make it only veiwable by people with player rights 0?

item.title: How to add a [server] to the chatbox ingame [[474]]
item.dc:creator: @HiddenPker HiddenPker
item.description:
@HiddenPker wrote:

here it is and its seen by everyone

} if(command.startsWith("message") && command.length() > 4 && playerRights >= 2) { String text = command.substring(8); yell("[SERVER]: " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }

Read full topic
item.source: How to add a [server] to the chatbox ingame [[474]]
